docs.abstract: Research in dogs will help with the design of later human trials, including the best way to administer drugs, and may lead to improved treatments for both pets and people.

docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton has "serious concerns" about health insurer Aetna's plan to acquire Humana and Anthem's proposal to buy Cigna, saying the multi-billion-dollar deals should be closely reviewed by U.S. regulators.

docs.lead_paragraph: Traveling to a region in the throes of a drug abuse crisis, President Barack Obama promised Wednesday to use his bully pulpit and federal programs to try to combat the "epidemic" of heroin use and prescription painkiller abuse that is upending communities across the country.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a forum at George Washington University, the vice president seemed to contradict his past comments.

headline.main: Biden Says He Didn’t Oppose Raid That Killed Bin Laden
headline.print_headline: Biden Recasts His Role in Killing of Bin Laden

docs.abstract: Vice Pres Joe Biden, who may be running for presidency, gives different account of advice given to Pres Obama before 2011 raid that killed Osama Bin Laden; previously said he advised against mission but now claims to have hinted privately that Obama should carry it out.
docs.snippet: In a forum at George Washington University, the vice president seemed to contradict his past comments.

byline.original: By GARDINER HARRIS and JONATHAN MARTIN

docs.lead_paragraph: The move by the government amounts to the first official acknowledgment that exposure to radiation at the disaster site may have caused cancer.

headline.main: Japan to Pay Cancer Bills for Fukushima Worker
headline.print_headline: Japan to Pay Cancer Bills for a Fukushima Worker

docs.abstract: Japan awards workers' compensation to unidentified man who developed leukemia after working on cleanup crew at Fukushima Daiichi nuclear power plant.
docs.snippet: The move by the government amounts to the first official acknowledgment that exposure to radiation at the disaster site may have caused cancer.
